DOC.brief_summary: This study compare effect 12 week treatment transdermal versus oral estrogen therapy testsoterone level thyroid test healthy , naturally menopausal woman .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Patch v . Pill Estrogen Therapy Testosterone Levels Thyroid Tests Menopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Healthy Naturally menopausal woman Aged 4270 year Currently use combination estrogenprogestin replacement therapy Women contraindication HRT use , include : Unexplained vaginal bleeding , liver disease , breast endometrial cancer , venous thromboembolic event Thyroid disease Adrenal disease
